name: HPC-Fa14
tagline: CSE Training Workshops in HPC Tools, Fall 2014 • DCL L440, 9–11 am
body:
All workshops will be held in L440 Digital Computer Laboratory, an EWS computer laboratory in the basement.  *If you are not an engineering student, you will need an EWS login to use the computer lab, so please email Neal Davis (contact information at bottom) at least 24 hours in advance.*

There is no sign-up for this series—walk-ins are welcome and encouraged!

# [Introduction to The Linux Command Line (Bash Shell)](#bash)
### Sep. 19, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440
### Oct. 17, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440

# [Introduction to Scientific Computing on Illinois Campus Cluster](#hpc)
### Sep. 26, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440
### Oct. 24, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440

# [MPI for Engineers](#mpi)
### Oct. 3, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440
### Oct. 31, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440

# [OpenMP for Engineers](#omp)
### Oct. 10, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440
### Nov. 7, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440

# [Python MPI4Py](#mpi4py)
### Oct. 8, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440

# [MATLAB Distributed](#matlabdist)
### Oct. 16, 9:00–11:00 • DCL L440

# About These Workshops
### Contributors
Neal Davis developed these materials.  The command line materials also draw from [Software Carpentry](http://software-carpentry.org/)'s excellent tutorials. This content is available under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License.

![CC-BY-3.0](https://i.creativecommons.org/l/by/3.0/88x31.png)

# Contact
If you have any questions about course availability, concepts, or content, please contact Neal Davis, Training Coördinator for Computational Science & Engineering, at davis68 at illinois dot edu.
